# Example: Verification commands by project type
# Rust projects:
cargo test test_feature_name cargo test --test integration_tests
# Web projects (Playwright):
bun x playwright test --grep "feature description" bun x playwright test tests/e2e/login.spec.ts
# Node.js projects:
bun test -- --grep "feature" bun x vitest run --grep "feature"
# Python projects:
pytest -k "test_feature" python -m pytest tests/test_module.py::test_feature
# Rules:
# - NEVER use 'cargo build' or 'bun run dev' as verification
# - Each command should test ONE specific behavior
# - Commands must exit 0 on success, non-zero on failure
